subject: Plus X Pedals - Brake Max Force
description_text:
Hello,

I’m trying to set my brake max force and I think I’m doing something wrong.
I open the software, calibrate, and then enter the max kg force to 45. Then
when I hit save the number changes every time.

What do I need to do to get the max force to stay at 45 kg?

Thanks,

Mitch Hoff
513-582-0259

conversations.body_text: Hi Mitchell Hoff, Please take a full screenshot of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 so that I can verify whether you are using the correct version.

When I got yesterday I caught that there was an update and that fixed it.
Everything is working properly now.

Thanks,

Mitch Hoff
513-582-0259


On Tue, Dec 9, 2025 at 8:26 PM service @simsonn.com
